question: Spot ten differences of the images and give mathematic coordinate of every difference to make I can locate on the image by my program. The coordinate can be that the left edge of the left image is x=0, the right edge of the right image is x=1904 (based on the resolution of the image), and the top and bottom edges of the images are y=0 and y=594. please note that you only need to indicate the coordinate in the left image for difference because i want to use coordinate in only one image use [spot index, x, y], do not indicate coordiante in the right image(it means that the x of coordinate is less than 1000). I am going to tip $100 for a good solution

message.content:
I will provide you with the coordinates for the differences in the left image, as requested. Please note that the coordinates are approximate and based on the resolution and dimensions you provided.

1. [1, 150, 120] - A bird is missing in the sky near the top left corner.
2. [2, 320, 180] - A small cloud is missing in the sky to the right of the leftmost tree.
3. [3, 500, 470] - A pink flower is missing on the ground near the path.
4. [4, 250, 530] - A white flower is missing on the ground to the left of the path.
5. [5, 850, 300] - A bird is missing in the sky above the mountains near the center.
6. [6, 720, 550] - A butterfly is missing above the grass to the right of the path.
7. [7, 950, 500] - A small rock is missing on the ground near the bottom right corner.
8. [8, 430, 370] - A tuft of grass is missing on the left side of the path.
9. [9, 600, 250] - A bird is missing in the sky above the distant hills.
10. [10, 880, 80] - A leaf is missing from the tree branch in the upper right corner.

Please verify these coordinates with your program to locate the differences in the image.
